scripts.build:static: chmod +x ./netlify-prebuild.sh && ./netlify-prebuild.sh && NEXT_IGNORE_ESLINT=1 SKIP_TYPE_CHECK=1 NEXT_USE_STATIC_EXPORT=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SKIP_API_ROUTES=true next build
scripts.netlify:static: chmod +x ./netlify-prebuild.sh && ./netlify-prebuild.sh && NEXT_IGNORE_ESLINT=1 NEXT_USE_STATIC_EXPORT=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SKIP_API_ROUTES=true SKIP_TYPE_CHECK=1 next build
scripts.netlify-build: npm run netlify-prebuild && node netlify-typescript-fix.js && SKIP_TYPE_CHECK=1 npm run build:static
